txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'A large force of goblins and Wargs has been sighted moving towards Faldham. Only the town centre has a wall; the remainder is all farmsteads spread across the plains. They will not be able to hold long without immediate aid.\n\n'Will you join the fight and protect my people?'
'I do not know how many more assaults we can repulse. Every day, our numbers grow fewer. That can be tomorrow's problem... for now, it is time that we had a drink.'
'Faldham will not defend itself, [placeholder]. Are you ready?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Siege of Faldham: Holding the Line
The Enemy is marching towards the small township of Faldham.
Defeated goblins and Wargs near Faldham ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat goblins and Wargs near Faldham ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Goblins and Wargs can be found at the farmsteads around Faldham.\n\nAldbéort asked you to aid in the defence of Faldham.
Aldbéort is at Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to hear Faldham has been defended and the attackers driven back.
